=== Notes ===
* After running a test event, you need to share your findings with the members of the quality team
* To do that, you need to write an email (simple text, no formatting, no special template) and send it to teh mailing list
* Go to the Archive of the mailing list, find the link of your email, copy the link and paste it on '''<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/amjjawad/Projects/Sandbox/TestingEvents/TestingResults | Testing Results Page]]</nowiki>'''
